description.en: A gentle sequence designed for yoga beginners to improve overall flexibility and body awareness. Perfect for those who are new to yoga or have limited mobility.
description.zh: 这个温和的序列专为瑜伽初学者设计，旨在提高整体柔韧性和身体意识。适合瑜伽新手或活动能力有限的人群。

instructions.en: Stand with your feet together, weight evenly distributed. Feel rooted to the ground.
instructions.zh: 双脚并拢，均匀受力。感受与地面的连接。

transitionHint.en: Begin in a stable standing position to center yourself and prepare for practice.
transitionHint.zh: 从稳定的站姿开始，让自己回到中心，为练习做准备。

instructions.en: On hands and knees, alternate between arching and rounding your spine with the breath.
instructions.zh: 四肢支撑，随着呼吸在拱背和塌腰之间交替。

transitionHint.en: Come down to your hands and knees, placing your wrists under shoulders and knees under hips.
transitionHint.zh: 放下身体，四肢着地，手腕在肩膀下方，膝盖在髋部下方。

instructions.en: Sit back on your heels, extend arms forward, rest forehead on mat.
instructions.zh: 坐回脚跟，手臂前伸，额头贴地。

transitionHint.en: From Cat-Cow, sit your hips back toward your heels while keeping arms extended.
transitionHint.zh: 从猫牛式，将臀部坐向脚跟，保持手臂伸展。

instructions.en: Form an inverted V-shape with your body, pressing firmly through hands and feet.
instructions.zh: 身体形成倒V形，手脚用力按压地面。

transitionHint.en: From Child's Pose, lift your hips up and back, straightening your arms and pressing your heels toward the floor.
transitionHint.zh: 从儿童式，抬起髋部向上和向后，伸直手臂，脚跟压向地面。

instructions.en: Sit with legs extended, fold forward from the hips, reaching toward your feet.
instructions.zh: 坐姿，双腿伸直，从髋部前折，手臂伸向脚部。

transitionHint.en: Come to a seated position, extend both legs out in front of you, and sit tall before folding.
transitionHint.zh: 来到坐姿，双腿向前伸直，挺直坐好后再前折。

instructions.en: Sit with soles of feet together, knees out to sides, gently press knees toward floor.
instructions.zh: 坐姿，脚掌相对，膝盖向两侧打开，轻轻将膝盖压向地面。

transitionHint.en: From Seated Forward Bend, bend your knees and bring the soles of your feet together.
transitionHint.zh: 从坐姿前屈，弯曲膝盖，将脚掌相对放在一起。

instructions.en: Lie on your back, drop knees to one side while keeping shoulders grounded.
instructions.zh: 仰卧，将膝盖放到一侧，保持肩膀接触地面。

transitionHint.en: Lie on your back, hug your knees to your chest before extending arms out and dropping knees to one side.
transitionHint.zh: 仰卧，将膝盖抱向胸部，然后伸展手臂，将膝盖放到一侧。

instructions.en: Lie flat on your back, arms at sides, palms up, and completely relax.
instructions.zh: 平躺，手臂放在身体两侧，掌心向上，完全放松。

transitionHint.en: Gently roll onto your back, extend your legs, and allow your entire body to relax into the floor.
transitionHint.zh: 轻轻滚到仰卧位置，伸直双腿，让整个身体放松到地面上。

benefits.en: Increases overall flexibility and joint mobility
benefits.zh: 增加整体柔韧性和关节活动度

benefits.en: Reduces muscle tension and promotes relaxation
benefits.zh: 减少肌肉紧张并促进放松

benefits.en: Improves body awareness and mind-body connection
benefits.zh: 提高身体意识和身心连接
